description: This Java class defines an in-memory user repository for managing User objects, providing methods for finding and saving users.

classes.name: UserRepository
classes.description: A repository managing User objects stored in-memory, with CRUD-like methods, intended to be replaced with a JPA implementation later.

methods.name: findById
methods.description: Finds a User by their unique ID.

methods.name: findByProviderAndProviderUserId
methods.description: Finds a User by provider and provider-specific user ID.

methods.name: save
methods.description: Saves a User object; assigns ID and timestamps if not present.

methods.name: findAll
methods.description: Returns a list of all stored Users.
